attributes.action: refuse any involvement with the US 'Son of Star Wars' missile defence program.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the Prime Minister not to allow any part of the proposed missile defence system on UK soil. Nor to support the system in principle. Making the UK more of a target, showing support for US foreign policy and  potentially instigating an arms race are all unwanted side effects.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
